name: Half-Orc
description: Half-orcs have traits deriving from their orc ancestry, including increased strength and constitution, faster maturity, and a tendency towards chaos.
abilityScoreIncrease: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
age: Half-orcs mature faster than humans, reaching adulthood around age 14 and rarely living longer than 75 years.
alignment: Half-orcs inherit a tendency towards chaos from their orc parents and are not strongly inclined towards good.
size: Half-orcs are larger and bulkier than humans, ranging from 5 to well over 6 feet tall. They are size Medium.
speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc. Orc is a harsh language with no script of its own.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions, able to see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light.

abilities.name: Menacing
abilities.description: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

abilities.name: Relentless Endurance
abilities.description: When reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. Can't be used again until a long rest.

abilities.name: Savage Attacks
abilities.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.
